title: Pakistan – Sri Lanka FTA review concluded in Colombo
content: In this Photo: Zafar Mahmood, Secretery of Pakistani Ministry of Commerce (seated right) and Tilak Collure, Secretary, Sri Lanka’s Ministry of Industry & Commerce (seated left) sign the agreed minutes of Pakistan Sri Lanka Free Trade Agreement (PSFTA) and related matters on Thursday 18 August at Colombo Hilton as Rishad Bathiudeen, the Sri Lankan Minister…
